alert.note: Alert for Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 7:26PM CDT until September 09 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Red Willow County in southwestern Nebraska... Eastern Hitchcock County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 726 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Culbertson, or 12 miles northeast of Trenton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Culbertson around 735 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
